Divine Realm Nero
Osiris (Soul)
Osiris (Child's Heart)
Your soul is mine
Void Scythe

After creating a capital, you instantly gain Thor and Osiris, upgrading a unit does not end its turn, all units ignore terrain and [ICON_Movement] movement penalties for crossing rivers, each time you train a Heavy Melee Modifier, Heavy Weapon Modifier, and Armored Ranged Modifier you gain another Heavy Melee Modifier, Heavy Weapon Modifier, and Armored Ranged Modifier, all units only cost 1 [ICON_Movement] movement to loot and have +30 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting a region
Pluto! Now! - Hugh
Reversed Personality
Hates all civilizations encountered
Temple of the Underworld

Osiris (Child's Heart) {LOC_ERA_CLASSICAL_NAME} landmark building, unlocked when a civilization enters {LOC_ERA_CLASSICAL_NAME}, after completion, all cities gain 15% [ICON_Culture] culture value, after winning the battle, gain [ICON_Culture] culture value equal to 100% of the [ICON_Strength] combat strength of the killed unit (at standard speed)
Temple of the Living Soul

Osiris (Soul) is a landmark building in {LOC_ERA_CLASSICAL_NAME}. It is unlocked when a civilization enters {LOC_ERA_CLASSICAL_NAME}. After it is built, all cities gain 15% [ICON_Science] science value. After winning the battle, gain [ICON_Science] science value equal to 100% of the [ICON_Strength] combat strength of the killed unit (at standard speed)
+{1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, from Osiris leader trait
Are you trying to please me? Well, if you can make me happy, maybe I'll consider keeping you alive a little longer.
Tsk...
Let me say this first. I have no intention of changing my mind. I just have a little more interest in you. Paranoia and madness, what will be waiting for you?
You really dare to accept it. You still have a little courage.
You're smart.
Don't worry, your pain has just begun
It's time to say goodbye
Okay, let them come, I will spare their lives
Walk Away
Some people who claim to be my "companions" are coming to your place to investigate.
Hahahaha, there is only one outcome for those who resist me
You'd better be ready to say goodbye to the world
I am... Pluto... Okay, you can start to flatter me.
Just look around, a dull place will only make people feel unhappy
Ah - this crappy place is so uncomfortable. I'm almost suffocating. It's a pity you can still stay here.
I'll just give you one chance, switch places, or leave before I get upset
Ha, I found some similarities in you...
You know what will happen if you provoke me?
But your expression can't lie
Don't stop me! Annoying guy
Before I change my mind, go away
Hahaha, is that all?
What a silly little trick, you think this will work on me?
Oh? Then try again.
There are some more bugs and lackeys in my territory because of you... You didn't consider the consequences of angering me at all, did you?
Oh? Then try again.
Uh...how come...
You are very good at pleasing me, what response do you want from me?
Tsk...
Remember, you are just her companion, it doesn't mean we will have that kind of childish relationship
Osiris has no interest in you.
